mapper.select: SELECT s.stock_id, s.quantity, s.product_status, s.order_status, b.branch_id, b.branch_name, b.location, m.menu_id, m.menu_name, m.price, m.description, m.category, m.image FROM stock s JOIN branch b ON s.branch_id = b.branch_id JOIN menu m ON s.menu_id = m.menu_id
